### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE buildings (
    building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    total_energy_usage DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE rooms (
    room_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    building_id INT NOT NULL,
    area DECIMAL(8,2) NOT NULL,
    energy_usage DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_building_id FOREIGN KEY(building_id) REFERENCES buildings(building_id)
);

CREATE TABLE appliances (
    appliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    appliance_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    room_id INT NOT NULL,
    power_consumption DECIMAL(8,2) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_room_id FOREIGN KEY(room_id) REFERENCES rooms(room_id)
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM appliances WHERE appliance_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE buildings (
    building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE rooms (
    room_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_number INT,
    floor_number INT,
    building_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES buildings(building_id)
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    room_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES rooms(room_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_usage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    energy_usage FLOAT,
    date_of_reading DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id)
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_usage > 100

CREATE TABLE buildings (

    location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE rooms (
    room_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

);

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    room_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES rooms(room_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_usage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    energy_usage FLOAT,
    date_of_reading DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id)
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM devices WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM energy_usage WHERE date_of_reading < '2022-01-01')

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE buildings (
    building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE rooms (
    room_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_number INT,
    floor_number INT,
    building_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES buildings(building_id)
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    room_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES rooms(room_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_usage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    energy_usage FLOAT,
    date_of_reading DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id)
);

DELETE FROM rooms WHERE building_id IN (SELECT building_id FROM buildings WHERE location = 'New York')

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE buildings (
  building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  building_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE rooms (
  room_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  room_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  building_id INT REFERENCES buildings(building_id) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE sensors (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  room_id INT REFERENCES rooms(room_id) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
  reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id) NOT NULL,
  reading_value DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id) NOT NULL,
  alert_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  alert_message TEXT NOT NULL
)

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM buildings WHERE building_id = 1;
